problems.problem_statement: What can we do to protect rare and endangered plants?
problems.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problems.problem_statement: How can schools help protect plants and bees?
problems.goalTitle: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

problems.problem_statement: How do wildflower meadows in cities help the environment?
problems.goalTitle: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
